```{r setup, include=FALSE}

set.seed(45398)

length = runif(1000,10,200); plot(pnorm(length),type='l')  	#good, random numbers
width = runif(1000,10,50)
qin = runif(1000,20,200)
qout = runif(1000,20,200)
cin = runif(1000,100,2000)
cout = runif(1000,500,1000)

eff_geom = rep(0,1000) ## vector to store results
for(i in 1:1000){
  
    eff_geom[i] = ((qout[i]*cout[i])-(qin[i]*cin[i]))/(exp((log(qout[i]*cout[i]) + log(qin[i]*cin[i]))/2))
  
  
}

plot(length,eff_geom)
plot(ecdf(eff_geom))



```
